hero.heading: I craft thoughtful and intuitive digital experiences.
hero.subHeading4: I started as a freelance designer in 2017 and I’m now proudly leading a small team of amazing Designers @ BETSOL. I love creating pleasant experiences for people, establishing empathy for both the people who make and the people who use the products I help bring to life.
